timeline.bodyText: I'm curious why you got rid of this query. Don't we still need it to populate designations in an expansion?
timeline.author: dmuylwyk

replies.bodyText: That query was not used at all, I only deleted it because IJ flagged it as an unused method
replies.author: jamesagnew

timeline.bodyText: Yep, this index was definitely wrong. We eventually need indexes on designation.language and designation.use to support the designation in parameter of the $expand operation; however, we definitely do not need an index on designation.value. Glad this came to light.
timeline.author: dmuylwyk
